Description:
Our client is a Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing company. They are now looking for a Electrical Sales Engineer to join them.Roles & Responsibilities (Max 5 points)Develop and execute sales strategies to meet or exceed sales targets for MV/LV products and services.
Identify and prospect new customers while maintaining existing customer relationships.
Conduct market research and analysis to identify customer needs, competitor activity, and new business opportunities.
Provide technical expertise and guidance to customers regarding MV/LV products and services.
Prepare and deliver sales presentations, proposals, and demonstrations to customers.
Collaborate with engineering and technical teams to ensure that product and service offerings meet customer requirements.
Attend events and trade shows to network and stay up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in the electrical engineering field.
Monitor and report on sales performance, including revenue, margins, and customer satisfaction metrics.Skills
Skills:
English fluency is required.
Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field.
2 to 5 years of experience in electrical sales in the Saudi Arabia Market.
Proven track record in sales, preferably in the panel builder or contracting industry.
Strong technical knowledge of electrical engineering principles and practices is necessary.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills are essential to build and maintain customer relationships.
Ability to understand customer needs and provide technical solutions to meet those needs.
